thread.section_title: Avery WePrint Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avery WePrint Australia | weprint.averyproducts.com.au
thread.title: janina
thread.title_full: Avery WePrint Australia reviewed by janina

author: janina
title: janina
text: Loved the customer service. My product unfortunately got lost by the post when I first ordered but immediately got resent it by Avery and when received unfortunately my art work didn't look as expected which was a bit disappointing. I was offered a reprint or immediate refund which was outstanding so still giving 5 star rating.
